Action.Name: Set
Action.Description: Runs all containing actions one by one.

Action.Name: Conditional
Action.Description: Applies positive if condition is passed, otherwise applies negative.

Condition.Name: Or
Condition.Description: Logical "or". Returns true if one of containing conditions return true, otherwise returns false.

Condition.Name: And
Condition.Description: Logical "and". Returns true if all of containing conditions return true, otherwise returns false.

Condition.Name: Not
Condition.Description: Logical "not". Returns the opposite on corresponding condition result.

Condition.Name: GreaterThan
Condition.Description: Returns true if value#1 is greater than value#2.

Condition.Name: LesserThan
Condition.Description: Returns true if value#1 is lesser than value#2.

Value.Name: Conditional
Value.Description: Returns positive brick value if condition is passed, otherwise returns negative.
